definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: The road branches after the level-crossing.
sentences.chinese: 那兩條道路在那裏交叉。

sentences.english: They decided to take the path of self-reliance.
sentences.chinese: 他們決定走自力更生的道路。

sentences.english: The path has never been perfect.
sentences.chinese: 道路從來不可能總是平坦的通途。

sentences.english: There is no half way work abut its influence.
sentences.chinese: 在它的影響中沒有中間道路。

sentences.english: China always adheres to the road of peaceful development.
sentences.chinese: 中國始終堅持走和平發展道路。
雨後的道路變得十分難走。

sentences.english: Quality image, brand name benefit, do the proven route, right-time & right-place development.
sentences.chinese: 樹精品意識，創品牌效益，走規模道路，搶時機發展？

sentences.english: Dubai sorely lacked such oversight in the run-up to the crash.
sentences.chinese: 在走向破產的道路上，迪拜非常缺乏這樣的監管。

sentences.english: As has been the case before, the military can be a trailblazer for the private sector.
sentences.chinese: 跟以往一樣，美軍可爲私營企業開創道路。

sentences.english: I started walking down an unfamiliar road. There was not a soul there.
sentences.chinese: 我開始沿着一條不熟悉的道路前行，連個人影都沒有。

sentences.english: There was nothing except shacks and muddy streets.
sentences.chinese: 那時只有低矮的窩棚似的小房子和泥濘的道路。

sentences.english: To make white or yellow hot-melt traffic paint.
sentences.chinese: 白色或黃色熱熔道路標線塗料。

sentences.english: And so she released him to be with those who resonated with his path.
sentences.chinese: 所以她放下了他，讓他和那些與他道路共振的人同行。

sentences.english: We're taking more of a 'left-of-center road'.
sentences.chinese: 我們在走“中心偏左的道路”。

sentences.english: Its road traffic is fairly convenient, ranking the key land post in Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 道路交通便利，是上海的陸上要津。

sentences.english: This signpost tells the way to the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 這個路標說明去動物園的道路。

definition: itinerary/route/political line (e.g. right revisionist road)/CL:條|条[tiao2]
on the road/on a journey/road surface
